message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"the day after tomorrow","sentence":"后天见。","image_prompt":"In a soft apocalypse animation style, illustrate two people waving at each other under a cloudy sky, with a faded cityscape in the background. The image should visually express the idea of 'see you the day after tomorrow,' with a calendar page showing two days forward. Gentle lighting and muted colors, somber yet hopeful atmosphere.","sentence_translation":"See you the day after tomorrow."}
